attributes.additional_details: They are in control of this situation
attributes.background: Stop rising the price of living

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the cost of living, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. If you started a new petition you'd need to provide your full name.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Introduce a "Triple lock" to restrict energy cap increases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621347

Subsidise a 'basic' amount of electricity for households: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616915

Reform energy pricing and taxes to better protect lower income households: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621407

Remove VAT on domestic energy bills now: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617418

Establish a not-for-profit state owned energy provider: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617446

Allow energy bills to be paid as part of salary sacrifice, saving Tax & NI: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621576
